name: 7 Doors
description:
7 Doors is a little puzzle game.

Your goal is to reach the end of the level. 
There are 7 doors around you, only one faith crossed, you seem to come back to the starting point. Or is it somewhere else?

 Can you find the exit?


This game was made in a very short time at the very beginning of my game art/game design studies.
This project has no ambition, it's a little puzzle created as part of the studies.

Blueprint programming in UE4
